name: Bandit (NNNIKKI)
description:
The Grand Museum is home to many great artifacts, but none are as expensive as the Trapezium Crystal. It's a gem rarer and much more powerful than a diamond. As the leader of the Black Crew, a thief organisation, it's your job to make sure that it will be swooped away this night at 11:32 PM. However, alarms go off and not everything goes as planned.

Make your way through 20 fast-paced and quick levels, avoiding enemies and dashing through obstacles. You have 10 seconds to complete each level, so hurry up!

Made by the Green Bean company for the 3rd Geta Jam with the theme "10 seconds". Mildly inspired by "Duke Dashington" by Adventure Islands.
